definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: The atmosphere inside the capsule was tense.
sentences.chinese: 密封艙裏的氣氛令人緊張。

sentences.english: Bauer moved backward, dragging Arete with him, until his spine touched the walls of the pressurized cabin.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾拖着阿雷特往後退，直到後背貼上密封艙壁。

sentences.english: The capsule had made the psychopaths worse.
sentences.chinese: 密封艙使心理變態狂們變得更壞了。

sentences.english: He has since sent a dozen capsules into space.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，他陸續把十二個密封艙送入了太空。

sentences.english: The ship's hold is built in watertight compartments.
sentences.chinese: 船艙建造成許多不漏水的密封艙。

sentences.english: The weight of the sealed cabin will influence the dropoff operation on the sea directly.
sentences.chinese: 密封艙的體重對海上投放作業的難易程度有直接影響。
